metadata.synopsis: The hag is on the brink of defeated. She's stoppped the fight to try and plead for her life by offering the player the thing she does best - a deal. If Mayrina is present she asks offers you a powerful gift in exchange for her life (she will also take Mayrina with her) or the hag can bargain for Mayrina's life but lose out on the powerful gift. It is a tense and heightened situation.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Repro steps:1. Start the game2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. goto -49 281; pass the check (Shift+Q) and have the illusion of the Sunlit Wetlands come off and reveal the Putrid Bog.4. goto -45, 6, 267; go into the Teahouse and confront the Hag; let her leave with Mayrina.5. Recon infiniteAp and god6.  goto -386.96, -5.56, 562.11; walk towards Mayrina; combat will start.7. Attack the Hag until she has around 10 HP; end your turn.8. Scene should start, where the Hag begs for her life.

42.speaker: GROUP_Act1_GLO_HagHag
42.text: Wait! Argh. Wait just a tick.
42.context: NodeContext: You're on the brink of being defeated in the fight and you've stopped it - preparing to beg for your life with a new deal. You're breathless and in pain, fighting to regain control.

56.speaker: GROUP_Act1_GLO_HagHag
56.text: Killing me is a waste of time - I'll find a way to return. Always have, always will.
56.context: NodeContext: little breathy from the fight, coldly determined in the second line

86.speaker: GROUP_Act1_GLO_HagHag
86.text: But it's... unpleasant. So how about we be civilised about this, hmm? I have something you want.
86.context: NodeContext: wincing at the thought in the first line, turning on the charm in the second, trying to regain control

57.speaker: Player
57.text: What I want is Mayrina - alive and free.

44.speaker: Mayrina
44.text: Don't let her take me. Please.
44.context: NodeContext: Trying not to cry - pleading with the player

12.speaker: GROUP_Act1_GLO_HagHag
12.text: Shut it. You owe me a babe, girl. And I'll take it - whether you like it or not.

77.speaker: GROUP_Act1_GLO_HagHag
77.text: Let me leave with the girl, and I'll give you power.
77.context: NodeContext: Hag saleswoman mode is in full swing. Charismatic and enticing.

107.speaker: GROUP_Act1_GLO_HagHag
107.text: You want to be stronger? Tougher? Smarter? Done! Anything is possible. (Ability Score +1)

88.speaker: GROUP_Act1_GLO_HagHag
88.text: Just let me keep the girl and her babe.

95.speaker: Lae'zel
95.text: A simple trade? More deception. Take her head.

70.speaker: Shadowheart
70.text: If her powers were worth anything, we wouldn't have beaten her. Finish this.

62.speaker: Karlach
62.text: Please! She's dreaming if she thinks we'd leave Mayrina here.

35.speaker: Astarion
35.text: Trading some whelp we just met for impossible power? It's a fine deal.

43.speaker: Wyll
43.text: Don't you dare take the offer. No power is worth such a cruel price.

19.speaker: Gale
19.text: Not only would this be a vile deal, it would be folly to trust a hag's gifts.

82.speaker: GROUP_Act1_GLO_HagHag
82.context: NodeContext: Commanding tone. It's the player's decision - the girl or the power.

26.speaker: Player
26.text: If you want to live, hand over Mayrina and this power. Right now.

81.speaker: GROUP_Act1_GLO_HagHag
81.context: NodeContext: Player has you beat. They've bested you in a deal and you're PISSED.

10.speaker: GROUP_Act1_GLO_HagHag
10.context: CinematicNodeContext: She yanked a clump of hair from her skull. Grinning, she tossed it to the player. NodeContext: Bitter and beaten. She yanked a clump of hair from her skull. Grinning, she tossed it to the player.

38.speaker: GROUP_Act1_GLO_HagHag
38.text: I'll not soon forget this, sweetness. You have my word.
38.context: NodeContext: A threat as you vanish. Menacing and cruel.

75.speaker: GROUP_Act1_GLO_HagHag
75.context: NodeContext: You've offered the player a deal and they've asked for double. You won't budge on your original offer. You're pissed they would even suggest it. Each word said with FORCE and purpose. Perhaps a pause between each one.

60.speaker: Player
60.text: No good can come of this. Let Mayrina go.

61.speaker: GROUP_Act1_GLO_HagHag
61.text: Gods turn your goody soul to shite.
61.context: NodeContext: Player has chosen to save the girl. You are not impressed. Rolled eyes, almost 'tsking.'

33.speaker: Mayrina
33.context: NodeContext: Afraid and relieved - the player just saved your life

18.speaker: GROUP_Act1_GLO_HagHag
18.text: Not that it matters - I'll find another just as plump an' ripe.
18.context: NodeContext: This is the salt in the wound as you flee and an extremely shitty thing to say. It doesn't matter that the 'hero' saved the girl - you'll keep hurting people.

34.speaker: Mayrina
34.text: But the deal... What about my husband? What happens to him?

65.speaker: GROUP_Act1_GLO_HagHag
65.text: Deal's off, you dumb cow! And you've her to thank for it.

20.speaker: Player
20.text: Keep the girl. I'll take the power.

50.speaker: GROUP_Act1_GLO_HagHag
50.context: NodeContext: Big smile - the player has taken your deal.

55.speaker: GROUP_Act1_GLO_HagHag
55.context: CinematicNodeContext: *She yanked a clump of hair from her skull. Grinning, she tossed it to the player. NodeContext: Player has agreed to take the power and let you leave with the girl. You're thrilled - you've won.

5.speaker: GROUP_Act1_GLO_HagHag
5.text: Deal's on, girl. And you're not leaving my side 'til you deliver.

99.speaker: GROUP_Act1_GLO_HagHag
99.text: Bollocks to luck. It's only the deal that counts.

30.speaker: Player
30.text: Get out of here before I change my mind.

112.speaker: GROUP_Act1_GLO_HagHag
112.text: Aw. Don't act like you won't miss me.

108.speaker: Player
108.text: If I ever see you again, you'll be fertilising this swamp.

97.speaker: GROUP_Act1_GLO_HagHag
97.text: If I ever see you again, you'll have a tentacle for a tongue.

69.speaker: GROUP_Act1_GLO_HagHag
69.text: I can set up shop elsewhere. People always need 'lotions and potions'.

87.speaker: Player
87.text: I think a dead hag is the answer here.

73.speaker: GROUP_Act1_GLO_HagHag
73.text: Fine. Have it your way! I'll rip your throat out yet, you little bollocks.
73.context: NodeContext: Combat is about to happen. Player has threatened you. You're enraged as you prepare to attack.

100.speaker: Player
100.text: My reinforcements are nearly here. Give me the girl and the power and they'll spare you.

59.speaker: Player
59.text: I'll have it all. Or I'll just settle for your life.

63.speaker: Player
63.text: I know a beaten opponent when I see one. Give me the power and the girl, and I'll let you live.

6.speaker: Player
6.text: Such power will let me better serve the Spider Queen. Give it to me.

46.speaker: Player
46.text: The human means nothing to me. Give me the power.

17.speaker: Player
17.text: In the name of Eilistraee, release the girl and leave this place - never to return.

47.speaker: GROUP_Act1_GLO_HagHag
47.text: Argh, nothing irks me more than a goody-two-shoes drow. Fine.

51.speaker: Player
51.text: Neither. But a hag's head would make an excellent trophy.

96.speaker: GROUP_Act1_GLO_HagHag
96.text: Tch. Tough talk from the oversized lemon. But fine. Have it your way. I'll rip out your throat!
96.context: NodeContext: Combat is about to happen. Player has threatened you. You're insulting them - a cruel blow - as you prepare to attack.

53.speaker: Player
53.text: You're a vile, monstrous creature. There is no bargain for you but death.

52.speaker: GROUP_Act1_GLO_HagHag
52.text: Tch. Doesn't it ever get lonely? Up on that high horse of yours?
52.context: NodeContext: Combat is about to happen. Player has threatened you. You're insulting them - a cruel blow - as you prepare to attack.

22.speaker: GROUP_Act1_GLO_HagHag
22.text: But have it your way. Tell your precious little god I say hello... after I rip out your throat!

80.speaker: Player
80.text: There's no choice to make. A corrupting force like you has to be destroyed.

45.speaker: Player
45.text: I'll bathe in your blood as I offer your death up in prayer.

111.speaker: GROUP_Act1_GLO_HagHag
111.text: Well, that doesn't sound very hygienic.

31.speaker: Player
31.text: You're a stain upon this land, but I will cleanse it.

23.speaker: GROUP_Act1_GLO_HagHag
23.text: Tch. I hear blood and guts make excellent fertiliser. Let's spread you over the soil and see, you little bollocks.
23.context: NodeContext: Combat is about to happen. Player has threatened you. You're insulting them - a cruel blow - as you prepare to attack.

83.speaker: Player
83.text: You have nothing that could tempt me.

41.speaker: GROUP_Act1_GLO_HagHag
41.text: Tch. Fine. Have it your way. I'll use that thick skull of yours as a stewing pot!
41.context: NodeContext: Combat is about to happen. Player has threatened you. You're insulting them - a cruel blow - as you prepare to attack.

11.speaker: Player
11.text: Hags are the scourge of the natural world. I'm going to kill you - as many times as needed.

71.speaker: GROUP_Act1_GLO_HagHag
71.text: I've never been called a scourge before, you flirt. But sweet words won't get you out of this one!

94.speaker: GROUP_Act1_GLO_HagHag
94.text: I knew I liked you, dearie.
94.context: NodeContext: Big smile, you think you have the player where you want.

91.speaker: Player
91.text: Indeed. I'll take your head and stick it on a pike.

14.speaker: GROUP_Act1_GLO_HagHag
14.text: Now, petal, there's... there's no need for such talk.
14.context: NodeContext: Player has threatened to kill you. You're scared and not used to it - trying not to show it.

13.speaker: GROUP_Act1_GLO_HagHag
13.text: If you're gloating now, just wait 'til you hear my offer, petal.
13.context: NodeContext: Player is gloating and you're thrilled - trying to turn anything to your advantage.

103.speaker: GROUP_Act1_GLO_HagHag
103.text: I can give you power. Anything you want!
103.context: NodeContext: Hag saleswoman mode is in full swing. Charismatic and enticing.

21.speaker: GROUP_Act1_GLO_HagHag
21.text: You want to be stronger? Tougher? Smarter? Done! Just let me go. (Ability Score +1)

76.speaker: Shadowheart
76.text: We've suffered her trickery long enough - end this.

36.speaker: Karlach
36.text: Poisoned deal. Trust me. Don't believe a word she says.

8.speaker: Astarion
8.text: I'm all for killing her, but let's get that power first, hmm?

105.speaker: GROUP_Act1_GLO_HagHag
105.context: NodeContext: Big smile - you're sure the player will take your deal.

27.speaker: Player
27.text: Keep your life and your magic. I don't want either.

104.speaker: GROUP_Act1_GLO_HagHag
104.text: Why, sweetness. You're either a saint or an eejit.
104.context: NodeContext: Player has let you go without a deal and with no cost. You can't believe they're that stupid. Big smile - you've won.

74.speaker: Player
74.text: Give me power - the more, the better.

29.speaker: Player
29.text: No. You die today. And should you dare return? I'll just kill you again.

110.speaker: Wyll
110.text: End her now, or she'll be cursing new victims by sundown.

85.speaker: Gale
85.text: To trust a hag, even when she's at your mercy, would be beyond folly. I say we end this.

66.speaker: Player
66.text: Careful. I doubt we have the same concept of 'civilised'.

32.speaker: Player
32.text: A servant of Vlaakith wants for nothing that her queen can't give.

102.speaker: GROUP_Act1_GLO_HagHag
102.text: Hold your horses - just hear me out.
102.context: NodeContext: Player has lightly threatened her, trying to clam them.

78.speaker: Player
78.text: I'm an expert on deals. No funny business.

92.speaker: GROUP_Act1_GLO_HagHag
92.text: You wound me, sweetie. My offer will put that little pact of yours to shame.
